com.mycompany.studentadvisinginterface

Class DcitDegree

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.studentadvisinginterface.DcitDegree
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompSciMajor, CompSciManagement, CompSciMinor, CompSciSpecial, InfoTechMajor, InfoTechManagement, InfoTechMinor, InfoTechSpecial

    public abstract class DcitDegree
extends Object
    Abstract class used as a template for the various degrees
    Author:
    Leah

      • printList

        public String printList(boolean exemptions)
        Prints the courses which are recommended
        Parameters:
        exemptions - boolean which is true if the student did Pure or N1 Math
        Returns:
        String

      • recommendCourses

        public final String recommendCourses(int semester,
                                     String status,
                                     double gpa,
                                     ArrayList<String> s1CourseList,
                                     ArrayList<String> s2CourseList,
                                     boolean exempt)
        Template method which generates a recommendation of courses based on the student information supplied
        Parameters:
        semester - the semester which the student is in
        status - full/part-time status of the student
        gpa - GPA of the student
        s1CourseList - empty list to hold courses for semester 1
        s2CourseList - empty list to hold courses for semester 2
        exempt - boolean which is true if the student did Pure or N1 Math
        Returns:
        String
